{| style="float: right;" | {{NBLOCKS |name = n-DAP |image = N-DAP-1.JPG |description = CMSIS-DAP Interface for mbed |Authors = NC |basedOn = [[n-U35]] |url = [https://bitbucket.org/nimbus_it/n-dap bitbucket] |url2 = [https://bitbucket.org/nimbus_it/n-dap bitbucket] |ztatus = Prototype |bcolor = blue }} |} ==Pinout== [[File:N-DAP-5.JPG|1000px]] ==Background== LPC11U32 based CMSIS-DAP programming of ARM Cortex devices via SWD. Appears as a Disk to PC. Tested with mbed firmware.
Can be designed-in as an SMD component to provide mbed '''mbed-enable''' capability




==Features== *Breadboard-able: 1/10 inch connector pitch *Solder as SMD component: SMD half pads at 1/10' pitch *Robust USB mini connector:

==mbed-enable Firmware== *Firmware to use n-DAP with the non-SMD LPC1114FN28 DIP-28 [https://developer.mbed.org/teams/Switch-Science/wiki/Firmware-LPC1114FN28 Firmware LPC1114FN28]

==History==

==Gallery== File:N-DAP-3.JPG File:N-DAP-2.JPG File:N-DAP-4.JPG

==Related articles in this Wiki== *[[ ]]
